messages.subject: Hello, I'm new to the group...sorry for the delayed intro
messages.msgSnippet: I m fortunate to live in Pensacola near Ren, who :-( will be moving. Anyway, she has been a wonderful inspiration to me in not just unschooling but with
messages.messageBody:
"
I'm fortunate to live in Pensacola near Ren, who :-(
will be moving. Anyway, she has been a wonderful
inspiration to me in not just unschooling but with
another area that is very emotional for me. She
accepted me with open and loving arms and has been the
single most factor in my decision to unschool. "


Aaaaw....thanks Sandy. I am honored and humbled by your post.:)

I'm glad I could be here to let you know it's all good on the other
side!

Welcome to the list, I think you'll find it a valuable resource and
font of inspiration. There are some incredible voices here...they
inspire me daily.

Ren
